cocktails.title: Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: Classic Bourbon cocktail with 10-year old Eagle Rare, bitters, and hints of orange.

cocktails.title: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.description: Buffalo Trace bourbon, lemon juice, simple syrup, and optional egg white.

cocktails.title: Electric Lemonade
cocktails.description: Absolut Citron, Blue Curaçao, sweet & sour, and Sprite. Served with a glowing surprise.

cocktails.title: Sazerac
cocktails.description: Rittenhouse 100 Rye, Pierre Ferrand 1840 Cognac, bitters, lemon.

cocktails.title: Moscow Mule
cocktails.description: Charbay Vodka, homemade ginger syrup, lime juice, club soda in copper tin.

cocktails.title: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.description: Grey Goose vodka, Cointreau, cranberry juice, lime juice. Sweet and delicious.

cocktails.title: Vesper Martini
cocktails.description: James Bond’s drink of choice. Gordon’s, vodka, Kina Lillet. Shaken, not stirred.

cocktails.title: Kamikaze
cocktails.description: Equal parts Grey Goose vodka, Cointreau, lime juice with lime spiral.

cocktails.title: Gin & Tonic
cocktails.description: Simply classic. Bombay gin with tonic service with a giant ice cube. No frills.

cocktails.title: Margarita
cocktails.description: Jose Cuervo Tequila and margarita mix. Blended with ice for frozen deliciousness.

cocktails.title: Rum & Coke
cocktails.description: Bacardi rum mixed with Mexican Coca-Cola. It’s hard to go wrong with this one.

cocktails.title: Screwdriver
cocktails.description: Odwalla orange juice and Absolut vodka stirred. Always refreshing.

cocktails.title: Shirley Temple
cocktails.description: A sweet, nonalcholic delite. Sprite and homemade Grenadine. Ellen’s non-alcholic go to.

cocktails.title: Martini
cocktails.description: Grey Goose vodka or Tanqueray gin with extra dry vermouth served with stuffed green olives.

cocktails.title: Hot Apple Toddy
cocktails.description: Bulleitt bourbon, hot apple cider, honey, lemon wedge, and a cinnamon stick.

cocktails.title: Sidecar
cocktails.description: Pierre Ferrand 1840 Cognac, Cointreau, lemon juice, homemade cane sugar syrup.

cocktails.title: Mint Julep
cocktails.description: Classic Kentucky Derby libation. Baker’s bourbon served with a mint bouquet in a copper tin.

cocktails.title: Piña Colada
cocktails.description: Malibu Coconut rum, pineapple juice, and cream. Blended to island perfection.
